Player History
Injured on 4/2/1965 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for 7 weeks...
Drafted in 5th round, 98th overall pick, by Houston in 1976...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1981, off Catfish Hunter (ATL)...

Won Player of the Week award on 9/1/1981, hitting .526 with 0 HR, 8 RBI...
